text: HRd <w4 rTHNf giferabrut (Teq 4Rdev # RTHFf HART4, HRT TRGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) F7n4 *It Ra 6, Fae7-10, #RqT,; # fccftf 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Land Acquisition/2022 Circular No. 7.1.77/2022 dated O9th 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/Tech/TN/LA/2021 (Computer No: 98302)} Sub.: Clarification of Policy No_ 11041/218/2207-Admn dated 05.11.2015 and Policy No. 7.1.74/2021 dated 01.11.2021-reg: The following amendment is carried out in Para 1 SL No. 3 of Table regarding Remuneration of  Private Surveyor / Amin of Policy Circular No_ 7.1.74/2021 dated 01.11.2021: SI.No. For Read 3 Private Surveyorl Amin: upto Rs.27,500/- Private   Surveyorl  Amin: upto Rs.27,500/- per per month or wage rate applicable as per month or minimum wages applicable as per State State Govt_orders,whichever is lower Govt orders,_whichever_is higher. 2 _ All other terms and conditions remains the same. This would be effective W.e.f. 01.11.2021, the date on which the Policy Circular No. 7.1.74/2021 dated 01.11.2021 was issued. All the cases, where the minimum wages are higher, shall be regulated accordingly. 3_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. oafoslw22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi  2 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3 Web Admin for circulation.
